梇字的基本解释

梇
lòng
〔梇栋〕中国汉代县名，在今云南省姚安县北。
古书上说的一种树。

梇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lòng］
［《廣韻》盧貢切，去送，來。］
(1)木名。
(2)古地名用字。汉益州郡有梇楝县，故址在今云南省姚安县北。参阅《後汉书·郡国志五》。

梇字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　梇； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页528第12
【集韻】【類篇】?盧貢切，音弄。【說文】木也。　又地名。【前漢·地理志】梇棟縣，屬益郡。亦作弄。

梇字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
梇字的起名意思

暂无。

梇
Basic explanation of words
梇
lòng
[梇dong] The name of a county in Han Dynasty in China, located in the north of Yao'an County, Yunnan Province.
A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books.
梇
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lòng］
["Guangyun" Lu Gongqie, go and send, come. ]
(1) Wooden name.
(2) Words used in ancient place names. In Yizhou County of Han Dynasty, there is Mie County, the former site is in the north of Yao'an County, Yunnan Province. Refer to "The Book of the Later Han Dynasty·The Five of Junguo".
梇
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　梇; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 528 No. 12
[Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? Lu Gongqie, Yinong. [Said the text] Mu Ye.　Also place name. [Former Han·Geography] Jidong County, belonging to Yi County. Also play tricks.
梇
